env.info: (at 0 3) (sort 1 cupboard) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (type 1 container) (opened 1) (sort 2 chair) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 sofa) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (sort 4 airconditioner) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 worktable) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (sort 6 chair) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (sort 7 washmachine) (size 7 big) (at 7 7) (type 7 container) (opened 7) (sort 8 book) (size 8 small) (color 8 red) (sort 9 cup) (size 9 small) (sort 10 remotecotrol) (size 10 small) (color 10 yellow) (at 10 3) (sort 11 can) (size 11 small) (color 11 red) (sort 12 cup) (size 12 small) (color 12 yellow) (plate 12) (sort 13 book) (size 13 small) (color 13 black) (at 13 4) (sort 14 cup) (size 14 small) (color 14 yellow) (sort 15 remotecontrol) (size 15 small) (sort 16 remotecontrol) (size 16 small) (color 16 black) (sort 17 can) (size 17 small) (color 17 red) (hold 17) (sort 18 book) (size 18 small) (color 18 white)

test.instr: (:ins (:task (close X) (:cond (type X container))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X yellow))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X airconditioner))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (type X container))) (:info (at X Y) (:cond (color X black) (type Y container))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X chair)))) )
test.nl: Close the door of all the container. Pick up a yellow cup. Open the cupboard. Pick up a remotecontrol. Go to the airconditioner. The door of the cupboard is opened. Do not go to the chair.
